scripts.copy-shared: git clone git@github.com:VICTORVICKIE/Elbrit-Play.git temp-elbrit && git clone https://github.com/NetArt-Org/Elbrit.git temp-elbrit-calendar && powershell -Command "mkdir share\datatable -Force; mkdir share\graphql-playground -Force; mkdir share\components -Force; robocopy .\temp-elbrit\src\app .\share /E /MIR; robocopy .\temp-elbrit\src\components .\share\components /E /MIR; rmdir .\temp-elbrit -Recurse -Force; mkdir shared\calendar -Force; if (Test-Path .\temp-elbrit-calendar\components) { robocopy .\temp-elbrit-calendar\components .\shared\calendar\components /E /MIR }; if (Test-Path .\temp-elbrit-calendar\lib) { robocopy .\temp-elbrit-calendar\lib .\shared\calendar\lib /E /MIR }; if (Test-Path .\temp-elbrit-calendar\services) { robocopy .\temp-elbrit-calendar\services .\shared\calendar\services /E /MIR }; if (Test-Path .\temp-elbrit-calendar\styles) { robocopy .\temp-elbrit-calendar\styles .\shared\calendar\styles /E /MIR }; if (Test-Path .\temp-elbrit-calendar\pages) { robocopy .\temp-elbrit-calendar\pages .\shared\calendar\pages /E /MIR }; rmdir .\temp-elbrit-calendar -Recurse -Force"
